page.title: 09SPARK MAGAZINE P3
page.content: Q.Do you think people enjoy reading it A. We have had no bad reports from the village. Q.Why did you call it the "Spark" ? A.We thought of the name "Spark" becaue it sounds bright and lively. Q.How many copies do you give away ? A.We have 2000 copies printed which are given to every household in the village. Q.Does everyone enjoy making them ? A.Yes people enjoy making it.It is a lot of hard work but it has a labour of love. Q.How often is it published ? A.Our aim is to have a magazine every 2 months.
